title: Spacious new!! 4 bed 2 bath apartment
posting_body: 4 bed 2 bath apartment next door to Summer Village Apartments.
This popular floor plan is now available for as low as $960.00 a month.
Give us a call or stop by our office at 808 W. 2nd
to check out all of the amenities.
24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Apply, Lease, Work Orders, Pay Rent, and many other On-line easy to use features Weekly Landscaping Maintenance Close to Walking/Biking Trails Walk to Chico State!

Next to Restaurants, Grocery Stores, Downtown Shopping, and Transportation./.Washer/Dryer in units and all new upgraded modern kitchens ,granite countertops with all new stainless steel appliances including dishwashers.
Bathrooms redone beautifully and hardwood floor throughout..
